price: 20. Ir Mes suteikėme tame pragyvenimo priemones jums ir tiems, kuriais jūs nesirūpinate [judantiems (gyviems) kūriniams, galvijams, žvėrims ir kitiems gyvūnams].
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha waman lastum lahu birāziqīna
